titles.title: A bill to establish the Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5225)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged by Voice Vote.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of Agriculture, Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 103-94.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 139.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Lands Cleanup Act of 1985 to rename Federal Lands Cleanup Day as Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day.
